description.value:
The arcanist can disrupt a spell effect or magic item by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir. This acts like a targeted @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{Dispel Magic} with a range of touch. The arcanist can add her Charisma modifier to the dispel check.

The arcanist must have the spell disruption exploit to select this exploit.
